title: Ripperville
description: Victorian London hides a deadly secret. Bloodshed stains the cobbled streets.An innocent boy born in poverty takes a path that will ultimately lead him to become one of the most notorious serial killers of the 19th century.One hundred and thirty years later Alice procures a painting. Little does she know the dark alleyway in the picture will take her on as journey through time revealing the truth about Jack the Ripper.Stalked by a strange man Alice discovers he has a connection to Whitechapel.Can she alter the events unfolding and prevent further murders?Will the past catch up with her?
author: Roger David Francis
